com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.capability
Interface IUnitCapabilityValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
UnitCapabilityValidator
public interface IUnitCapabilityValidator

Implemented by validators of Capability subtypes that are independent of the unit.

Not intended to be directly implemented. Use UnitCapabilityValidator.

See Also:
UnitValidator.addCapabilityValidator(IUnitCapabilityValidator)

getCapabilityType

EClass getCapabilityType()
Returns:
returns tha type of capability processed by this validator.

appliesTo

boolean appliesTo(Capability capability,
                  Unit unit,
                  IDeployValidationContext context)
Checks if the validator applies to the capability.

Parameters:
capability - the provided capability to be validated of type getCapabilityType().
unit - the unit providing the capability.
context - the validation context.
Returns:
true if the validator applies to the capability.

validateCapability

void validateCapability(Capability capability,
                        Unit unit,
                        IDeployValidationContext context,
                        IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates a capability provided by the unit.

Parameters:
capability - the provided capability to be validated of type getCapabilityType().
unit - the unit providing the capability.
context - the validation context.
reporter - used to report validation errors.
